name: Day and Night (itch) (LadyMistLeaf)
description:
And yet another human falls into the clutches of the Demon Lord and Demoness.  The trial this time is to make it to the platform at the other end of a ravine.  And make sure to not take too long, or else you might fall...

 Arrow keys to move and spacebar to jump!  You do need to click on the screens to proceed to the game though.

 The original plan was to also include enemies to avoid, but, classic LD, ran out of time to do that.  As such, the daytime period got shortened to avoid being too boring (I'm not going to make you guys sit through 10 seconds of nothing), while the nighttime was left at it's original plan of 10 seconds.

 I wrote the code in Javascript with no engine, I created the art in paint.Net and I provided the voice for the Demoness (and the Demon Lord's slight appearance).
